description: SANS Cyber Aces providing free cybersecurity tutorials and educational resources covering operating systems, networking, and security basics. COMPLETELY FREE access to foundational cybersecurity training.

bash.check_resources:
#!/bin/bash
# SANS Cyber Aces Resources Check - FREE!

echo "🎓 SANS Cyber Aces Resources (FREE!)"
echo "====================================="
echo "Date: $(date)"
echo ""

# Available modules
echo "📚 Free Learning Modules:"
echo "   • Operating Systems"
echo "   • Networking"
echo "   • Security Basics"
echo "   • Linux Essentials"
echo "   • Windows Security"
echo "   • PowerShell"
echo ""

# Resources
echo "🆓 Free SANS Resources:"
echo "   • Cyber Aces: https://www.sans.org/cyberaces/"
echo "   • Reading Room: https://www.sans.org/white-papers/"
echo "   • ISC: https://isc.sans.edu/"
echo "   • Webcasts: https://www.sans.org/webcasts/"
echo "   • Cheat Sheets: Available on blog"
echo ""

# Learning path
echo "📈 Recommended Learning Path:"
echo "   1. Start with OS Basics"
echo "   2. Learn Networking Fundamentals"
echo "   3. Study Security Principles"
echo "   4. Practice with Labs"
echo "   5. Read White Papers"
echo "   6. Attend Webcasts"
echo ""

# Study tips
echo "💡 Study Tips:"
echo "   [ ] Set regular study schedule"
echo "   [ ] Take notes during tutorials"
echo "   [ ] Practice commands hands-on"
echo "   [ ] Join community discussions"
echo "   [ ] Complete all exercises"
echo ""

echo "📅 Generated: $(date)"

curl.check_isc:
# Check Internet Storm Center - FREE!
curl -s https://isc.sans.edu/api/infocon?json | jq '.status'

python.learning_path:
import json
from datetime import datetime

class SANSCyberAcesLearning:
    """SANS Cyber Aces Learning Path - COMPLETELY FREE!"""
    
    def __init__(self):
        self.base_url = 'https://www.sans.org/cyberaces/'
        
        # Learning modules
        self.modules = {
            'Operating Systems': {
                'topics': [
                    'Operating System Basics',
                    'Windows Fundamentals',
                    'Linux Essentials',
                    'macOS Security',
                    'File Systems',
                    'Process Management',
                    'Memory Management',
                    'Security Features'
                ],
                'duration': '8-10 hours',
                'level': 'Beginner'
            },
            'Networking': {
                'topics': [
                    'OSI Model',
                    'TCP/IP Stack',
                    'IP Addressing and Subnetting',
                    'Routing and Switching',
                    'DNS and DHCP',
                    'Network Protocols',
                    'Packet Analysis',
                    'Network Security Basics'
                ],
                'duration': '10-12 hours',
                'level': 'Beginner'
            },
            'Security Basics': {
                'topics': [
                    'CIA Triad',
                    'Authentication and Authorization',
                    'Cryptography Fundamentals',
                    'Security Policies',
                    'Risk Management',
                    'Incident Response Basics',
                    'Security Tools',
                    'Best Practices'
                ],
                'duration': '8-10 hours',
                'level': 'Beginner'
            }
        }
    
    def get_learning_path(self):
        """Generate recommended learning path"""
        print("🎓 SANS Cyber Aces Learning Path (FREE!)\n")
        
        print("📚 Recommended Learning Order:\n")
        
        learning_order = [
            ('1. Operating Systems', 'Foundation for all cybersecurity'),
            ('2. Networking', 'Understanding how systems communicate'),
            ('3. Security Basics', 'Core security principles and practices'),
            ('4. Hands-on Labs', 'Practice with virtual environments'),
            ('5. Advanced Topics', 'Specialized security domains')
        ]
        
        for step, description in learning_order:
            print(f"   {step}")
            print(f"      {description}")
        
        print("\n📖 Module Details:\n")
        
        for module_name, module_info in self.modules.items():
            print(f"🔸 {module_name}:")
            print(f"   Duration: {module_info['duration']}")
            print(f"   Level: {module_info['level']}")
            print(f"   Topics:")
            for topic in module_info['topics']:
                print(f"      • {topic}")
            print()
        
        return self.modules
    
    def get_free_resources(self):
        """List all free SANS resources"""
        print("🆓 Free SANS Resources (COMPLETELY FREE!)\n")
        
        resources = {
            'Training': [
                ('Cyber Aces Tutorials', 'https://www.sans.org/cyberaces/', 'Free foundational tutorials'),
                ('SANS Webcasts', 'https://www.sans.org/webcasts/', 'Live and recorded webcasts'),
                ('Community Presentations', 'https://www.sans.org/presentations/', 'Conference presentations')
            ],
            'Reading Materials': [
                ('Reading Room', 'https://www.sans.org/white-papers/', 'Security research papers'),
                ('InfoSec Glossary', 'https://www.sans.org/security-resources/glossary-of-terms/', 'Security terminology'),
                ('Cheat Sheets', 'Various', 'Quick reference guides')
            ],
            'Threat Intelligence': [
                ('Internet Storm Center', 'https://isc.sans.edu/', 'Daily security news'),
                ('DShield', 'https://www.dshield.org/', 'Collaborative defense'),
                ('Handler Diaries', 'https://isc.sans.edu/diary/', 'Security analysis')
            ],
            'Tools': [
                ('SIFT Workstation', 'https://www.sans.org/tools/sift-workstation/', 'Forensics toolkit'),
                ('REMnux', 'https://remnux.org/', 'Malware analysis distro'),
                ('Security Tools', 'https://www.sans.org/tools/', 'Various free tools')
            ]
        }
        
        for category, items in resources.items():
            print(f"📂 {category}:")
            for name, url, description in items:
                print(f"   • {name}")
                print(f"     {description}")
                print(f"     🔗 {url}")
            print()
        
        return resources
    
    def study_plan(self, hours_per_week=5):
        """Create personalized study plan"""
        print(f"📅 Personalized Study Plan ({hours_per_week} hours/week) - FREE!\n")
        
        total_hours = sum([10, 11, 9])  # Average hours for all modules
        weeks_needed = total_hours // hours_per_week
        
        print(f"⏱️ Time Commitment:")
        print(f"   • Total content: ~30 hours")
        print(f"   • Your pace: {hours_per_week} hours/week")
        print(f"   • Estimated completion: {weeks_needed} weeks\n")
        
        weekly_plan = [
            'Week 1-2: Operating Systems Basics',
            'Week 3-4: Networking Fundamentals',
            'Week 5-6: Security Principles',
            'Week 7: Review and Practice',
            'Week 8: Capstone Exercises'
        ]
        
        print("📆 Weekly Schedule:")
        for week in weekly_plan:
            print(f"   {week}")
        
        print("\n✅ Daily Activities:")
        daily_activities = [
            'Watch tutorial videos (30-45 min)',
            'Read documentation (30 min)',
            'Practice exercises (30 min)',
            'Review notes (15 min)',
            'Join community discussions (15 min)'
        ]
        
        for activity in daily_activities:
            print(f"   • {activity}")
        
        return weeks_needed
    
    def certification_path(self):
        """SANS certification preparation path"""
        print("🏆 SANS Certification Path (After Free Training)\n")
        
        print("📈 Progression Path:")
        
        certs = [
            ('GSEC', 'GIAC Security Essentials', 'Entry-level', 'General security'),
            ('GCIH', 'GIAC Certified Incident Handler', 'Intermediate', 'Incident response'),
            ('GPEN', 'GIAC Penetration Tester', 'Intermediate', 'Penetration testing'),
            ('GCFA', 'GIAC Certified Forensic Analyst', 'Advanced', 'Digital forensics'),
            ('GCIA', 'GIAC Certified Intrusion Analyst', 'Advanced', 'Network monitoring')
        ]
        
        print("After completing free Cyber Aces tutorials, consider:\n")
        
        for cert, name, level, focus in certs:
            print(f"   📜 {cert} - {name}")
            print(f"      Level: {level}")
            print(f"      Focus: {focus}")
        
        print("\n💡 Preparation Tips:")
        tips = [
            'Complete all free Cyber Aces modules first',
            'Join SANS community for networking',
            'Attend free SANS webcasts',
            'Read SANS white papers in your area',
            'Practice with hands-on labs',
            'Consider SANS Work-Study program for discounts'
        ]
        
        for tip in tips:
            print(f"   • {tip}")
        
        return certs
    
    def generate_learning_report(self):
        """Generate comprehensive learning report"""
        print(f"🎓 SANS Cyber Aces Learning Report (FREE!)")
        print(f"Report Date: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
        
        print("=" * 50)
        print("📚 LEARNING PATH")
        print("=" * 50)
        self.get_learning_path()
        
        print("=" * 50)
        print("🆓 FREE RESOURCES")
        print("=" * 50)
        self.get_free_resources()
        
        print("=" * 50)
        print("📅 STUDY PLAN")
        print("=" * 50)
        self.study_plan()
        
        print("\n" + "=" * 50)
        print("🏆 CERTIFICATION PATH")
        print("=" * 50)
        self.certification_path()
        
        print("\n" + "=" * 50)
        print("🔗 QUICK LINKS")
        print("=" * 50)
        
        print("\n📱 Essential Links:")
        print(f"   • Cyber Aces: {self.base_url}")
        print("   • ISC: https://isc.sans.edu/")
        print("   • Reading Room: https://www.sans.org/white-papers/")
        print("   • Webcasts: https://www.sans.org/webcasts/")
        print("   • Tools: https://www.sans.org/tools/")
        
        print("\n🎯 Next Steps:")
        print("   1. Start with Operating Systems module")
        print("   2. Set a consistent study schedule")
        print("   3. Join SANS community forums")
        print("   4. Practice with hands-on exercises")
        print("   5. Track your progress")
        print("   6. Share knowledge with peers")
        
        return True

# Usage
learning = SANSCyberAcesLearning()
learning.generate_learning_report()
